channel.title: Certificate on Abdulrahman Alomairah

item.title: My Journey to eJPTv2 Certification
item.description:
I’ve always had a fascination with penetration testing, information gathering, and enumeration. There’s something thrilling about delving into the intricacies of a system, discovering its vulnerabilities, and ultimately strengthening its defenses. But for me, it’s more than just a passion; it’s a way of life.

Embracing Control and Privacy

One of the driving forces behind my interest in penetration testing is my love for self-hosting personal services. I’m a firm believer in having control over my data and privacy. Whether it’s my email server, cloud storage, or even my personal website, I prefer to manage these services myself. It allows me to ensure that my data remains mine and is not at the mercy of third-party providers. Most of the time…

item.title: STC Incident Response Virtual Work Experiance
item.description:
Certificate of Completion: Virtual Work Experience in Cybersecurity Incident Response Analysis

I’m thrilled to share that I’ve successfully completed a Virtual Work Experience program focused on Cybersecurity Incident Response Analysis. This immersive program provided me with invaluable insights into the world of cybersecurity and equipped me with practical skills to effectively respond to potential threats.

Program Highlights:

  • Hands-on Experience: Throughout the program, I had the opportunity to work with real-world data and scenarios. This allowed me to gain practical experience and a deeper understanding of cyber threats and vulnerabilities.
